TopicTitle: Looking for more realistic jet engines

Articles.Content:
Hello guys,

 

I've decided to include many realism mods in my current career playthrough and was wondering if any of you knew of any mods that make stock jet engines more realistic (you know, turbofans not magically becoming more efficient above Mach 1...)?
I don't know about being more realistic, but AirplanePlus and OPTSpaceplanes add some kick-butt looking jet engines along with a full suite of aircraft parts. Does this fit the bill for you?
Advanced Jet Engine would be be worth looking at
